techmeme.title: Sources: TSMC is informing Chinese customers using its 16nm or better tech that it cannot ship orders unless they use a US "white list" chip packaging supplier (Cheng Ting-Fang/Nikkei Asia)
CoinMarketCap: Circle's USDC market cap reached a new high of $56.2B on February 9, after dropping to $24.5B in 2023 in the months following FTX's collapse (Monique Mulima/Bloomberg)
PlayStation Network has been experiencing a multi-hour outage, affecting account management, gaming and social, and PlayStation Video, Store, and Direct website (Jay Peters/The Verge)
Nikkei: Japan's financial regulator asks Apple and Google to remove apps from Bybit, MEXC Global, LBank Exchange, KuCoin, and Bitget; Apple has removed the apps (James Hunt/The Block)
An Adalytics report shows how ad systems run by Google, Amazon, Microsoft and others inadvertently placed ads on a website that hosts CSAM (Thomas Germain/BBC)
